attributes.action: Appoint a  govorment minister/M.P to act and speak in parliament on behalf of animal welfare and to be the voice of the people who want justice and protection for non human creatures  so they can be fairly and justly treated...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years we as a cruel race have dominated and treated cruelly the animal kingdom just because they do not speak our language they have souls and feelings like humans do and therefore should have laws to protect there welfare....also when a company has tested and ill treated by certain companies they by law should have to state on product TESTED ON ANIMALS so we know and  have a choice to buy the  product or not the same way as the nutritional value label is a legal requirement so should this be it's not to much to ask...
